com.sudoplay.axion

Class AxionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.AxionConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AxionConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The AxionConfiguration class manages all the user-definable configuration state for an Axion instance.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AxionConfiguration.CharacterEncodingType
      The character encoding type that an AxionConfiguration will use to read and write strings with the AxionInputStream.readString() and AxionOutputStream.writeString(String) methods.
      static class  AxionConfiguration.CompressionType
      The compression type that an AxionConfiguration will use to read and write when accessing the underlying streams.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static AxionConfiguration EXT_CONFIGURATION
      An AxionConfiguration instance that extends the original NBT specifications to include the boolean class and common array classes.
      protected static AxionConfiguration SPEC_CONFIGURATION
      An AxionConfiguration instance configured to read and write NBT using the original specifications; supports the late added TAG_Int_Array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AxionConfiguration()
      Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.Unlocked.
      protected AxionConfiguration(AxionConfiguration toCopy)
      Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance by duplicating all registered TagAdapters, TagConverters and NBTObjectMappers.
      protected AxionConfiguration(AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode newProtectionMode)
      Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with the given AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.

    • Field Detail

      • SPEC_CONFIGURATION

        protected static final AxionConfiguration SPEC_CONFIGURATION
        An AxionConfiguration instance configured to read and write NBT using the original specifications; supports the late added TAG_Int_Array.

      • EXT_CONFIGURATION

        protected static final AxionConfiguration EXT_CONFIGURATION
        An AxionConfiguration instance that extends the original NBT specifications to include the boolean class and common array classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AxionConfiguration

        protected AxionConfiguration()
        Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.Unlocked.

      • AxionConfiguration

        protected AxionConfiguration(AxionConfiguration toCopy)
        Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance by duplicating all registered TagAdapters, TagConverters and NBTObjectMappers. The StreamCompressionWrapper is not duplicated, merely referenced.

        The new instance created will be AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.Unlocked.

        Parameters:
        toCopy - the AxionConfiguration to duplicate

      • AxionConfiguration

        protected AxionConfiguration(AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode newProtectionMode)
        Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with the given AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.
        Parameters:
        newProtectionMode -

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        protected AxionConfiguration lock()
        Changes this configuration's protection mode to Locked. Any attempt to change this configuration while it is locked will result in an exception. Use unlock() to unlock.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        Returns:
        this AxionConfiguration
        See Also:
        unlock(), setImmutable()

      • unlock

        protected AxionConfiguration unlock()
        Changes this configuration's protection mode to Unlocked.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        Returns:
        this AxionConfiguration
        See Also:
        lock(), setImmutable()

      • setImmutable

        protected AxionConfiguration setImmutable()
        Changes this configuration's protection mode to Immutable. Once this mode is set, it can't be undone.
        Returns:
        this AxionConfiguration
        See Also:
        lock(), unlock()

      • isLocked

        protected boolean isLocked()
        Returns:
        true if protection mode is Locked

        Returns:

      • registerTag

        protected <T extends Tag,V> AxionConfiguration registerTag(int id,
                                               java.lang.Class<T> tagClass,
                                               java.lang.Class<V> type,
                                               TagAdapter<T> adapter,
                                               TagConverter<T,V> converter)
                                  throws AxionTagRegistrationException,
                                         AxionInstanceException
        Registers the relationships for a tag.

        Can't use when Locked or Immutable.

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the tag
        tagClass - the class of the tag
        type - the class of the type
        adapter - TagAdapter for the tag
        converter - TagConverter for the tag
        Returns:
        this AxionConfiguration
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException
        AxionInstanceException

      • getBaseTagAdapter

        protected TagAdapter<Tag> getBaseTagAdapter()
                                     throws AxionTagRegistrationException

        If no base tag adapter has been registered, an exception is thrown.

        Returns:
        the base TagAdapter
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException
